titles.title: MP42 At This Time Of Giving

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Earth could not contain the treasures
heaven holds for you,
perfect joy and lasting pleasures,
love so strong and true.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
May His tender love surround you
at this Christmastime;
may you see His smiling face
that in the darkness shines.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
But the many gifts He gives
are all poured out from one;
come receive the greatest gift,
the gift of God's own Son.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
At this time of giving,
gladly now we bring
gifts of goodness and mercy
from a heavenly King.
